    GPErks.perks.diagnostics module¶

    class GPErks.perks.diagnostics.Diagnostics(emulator: GPEmulator)[source]¶

    Bases: object

    A set of diagnostics to validate and assess the adequacy of a Gaussian process emulator as surrogate for a given computer program. Ref: L.S. Bastos and A. O’Hagan (2009) doi:10.1198/TECH.2009.08019

    chi_squared()[source]¶

    Chi-squared distribution with m degrees of freedom.

    credible_interval()[source]¶

    Not a distribution: Monte Carlo simulations are required for mean and std estimates.

    mahalanobis_distance()[source]¶

    Scaled F-Snedecor distribution with m and n-q degrees of freedom.

    plot(errors_type: str = 'pivoted')[source]¶
    summary()[source]¶
    GPErks.perks.diagnostics.pivoted_Cholesky_factorization(A)[source]¶
